code: const{default:SummaryApi}=require("../common");const fetchCategoryWiseProduct=async category=>{const response=await fetch(SummaryApi.categoryWiseProduct.url,{method:SummaryApi.categoryWiseProduct.method,headers:{"content-type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({category:category})});const dataResponse=await response.json();return dataResponse;};export default fetchCategoryWiseProduct;
